Pre-Game Insights: Both populations are heavily concentrated in South Florida, where the culture is so inescapably Latin American that most residents, regardless of nationality or ethnicity, know the difference between an Argentine empanada (wheat flour, baked) and a Colombian one (corn flour, fried).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The average price for Copa América final tickets had spiked to nearly $1,300 each.
Others: The Copa América final will be held at the Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, and the region is expected to be a soccer hub, driven in part by Inter Miami, the Major League Soccer franchise owned in part by the former star David Beckham.
